page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH.
page.content: At seven o clock I switch my alarm off and put my radio on, pull the covers over my head until I hear Mum shouting. I get my dressing gown and go down stairs for my breakfast. After eating I wash and get dressed.By this time Mum is ready to leave. Richard my brother has to catch the school bus. This leaves Dad and me Dad shuts Lady our dog in the kitchen and we go up to Lisas to wait for school time. Our house is now empty except for Lady. At eight forty five Lisa and I go to school until three forty five. I walk home I am often first home I let Lady out. Mum and Richard get home together Dad gets home at five thirty when we have tea at about eight o clock I watch telivision till about nine o clock bed time.
